courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: JOUR 340.
description: Advanced techniques for reporting, producing, writing, shooting, and editing video news stories and for producing and airing regularly scheduled news programs on deadline. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: JOUR 340.
label: Video Storytelling 2-Producing
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Journalism or Broadcast Journalism or Agricultural Communications major(s). Restricted to students with Senior class standing.
